overview: The film deals with the absurd wars issue and its reflection upon mankind, the file headline and only is the dictator who grabs the life of his people and gives them wars instead to satisfy his instinct, the film is categorized as a psychological horror type of movies in Surrealism way, embodies a symbolic idea which is generations crushed because of wars and blood, The characters in the movie are icons for an executioner has no vision upon the humanitarian level but blood, war, hunger and absurd wars, on the other hand, a young man presented the crushed generations because of the mentioned absurd and turn them into a dependency.  Our hope is in the new generation, shall they keep tracking the executioners’ paths, the warlords and blood traders? or they shall try to get rid of them and start building a new country and modern civil generation Keep pace with development to human advancement.
title: Circlet
